com.elderbyte.code

Class ExpressionParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.elderbyte.code.ExpressionParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IExpressionParser
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MathExpressionParser

    public class ExpressionParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements IExpressionParser
    A generic parser for (Math, C, or Java) Style expressions. This parser works in three steps: 1. The scanner tokenizes the input string into Token Symbols 2. The (Reverse Polish Notation) RPN Transformer transforms the token stream into RPN. 3. The ASTGenerator takes the RPN Token stream and builds an AST from it.
